articles.description: Equitas Holdings’ net profit of Rs 1 billion in Q2 FY21 came on the back of higher NII, as margins expanded and provisions fell.

articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.title: Gland Pharma’s Rs 6,480 crore IPO sails through, gets 2.06x bids - Economic Times
articles.description: Progressive Share Brokers said that sentiment towards the IPO has dampened a bit due to Chinese investments as well as from the fact that Satyam founders hold a stake in the company.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: The biggest pharma IPO by Gland Pharma got fully subscribed on the last day of the bidding process on Wednesday.
By 6 pm, the Rs 6,480 crore issue had received bids for 6,21,55,670 shares… [+3061 chars]

articles.title: China's ByteDance Files Petition Against Trump's TikTok Ban Order - NDTV
articles.description: TikTok asked a Washington court Tuesday to stop an order from US President Donald Trump's administration from taking effect this week as the White House seeks to ban the Chinese-owned app in the United States.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump signed a set of orders against the video platform this summer. (File)

articles.title: Toyota India Declares Lockout At Its Bidadi Manufacturing Facility In Karnataka - CarandBike
articles.description: Around 1,200 workers at Toyota's Bidadi facility went on sit-in strike from November 9, 2020, as a protest against suspending a factory worker.
